WRITING.TITLE: I have a problem
WRITING.TEXT: So the other day my mom came home early and caught me cutting. She yelled at me for about an hour than left. And once she left i started cutting again. I just feel so happy when i cut and people don't understand that i cant stop and will not stop. And people expect that i stop but why should i don't have a reason to stop.
Same everyone at school thinks i am happy because i smile all the time but really i just want to die.

WRITING.TITLE: is this abuse
WRITING.TEXT: So my mom sometime get drunks and gets mad at me and my sister. One day she was sitting and my sister yelling at her. so i push her off her so she pined me against the wall then slapped me. I slapped her back and we were hitting each other she ended up on top of me then stater to chock me and i got her off of me but she just got back on me and chocked me again. After she went in her room and acted like i started it. Right now she said was using self defense so i don't know.
I can totally relate to this everybody just pretends to care about me because they know I'm suicidal .

WRITING.TITLE: what should i do?
WRITING.TEXT: Today mom stared to yell at my sister because she accidentally hit over her wine bottle and started to hit her. I told her to stop but she smacked me instead and said that we bitches and we are just like our father. My father is a liar, cheater, abuser, and child molester. That why we move away from him. So when she said that i snap I broke down crying and said your the reason I want to die.
DCFS has came to me house multiple time but she does not leave marks on me so they don't believe me.
you are so brave and strong!
you can always talk to me..
no you are not the problem they are. I think you are deserving of love and care.
i am sorry if you ever need to talk i am here
i am here!!!! you can always talk to me
i know how you feel and i am so sorry
